articles.author: Heidi Parker
articles.title: Angelina Jolie is partnering with Chloe - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 48-year-old Hollywood icon is working with the French luxury fashion house to create the sustainable Atelier Jolie range which has been co-designed by Angelina and Gabriela Hearst.
articles.content:
Angelina Jolie is partnering with Chloe.
The actress and director- who announced her own label in mid May - has teamed up with the brand to create a womenswear capsule collection.
